<traits>
<trait label="Camping" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=465" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 59</row>

</column>

---

_Nethys note: This camping activity requires that Nok-Nok is camping with the PCs (but see [Learn from a Companion](/Actions.aspx?ID=1477))._

Nok-Nok sets several annoying and frustrating traps around the camp's perimeter. If the campsite is attacked by enemies during the next 24 hours, the invaders suffer a –1 item penalty to all attack rolls and skill checks on the first round of combat as they navigate the distracting traps. Any enemy whose initiative result is less than Nok-Nok's [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC is also [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) from the traps until the start of their turn on the second round of combat.
